prompt:
Given the following ontology and sentences, please extract the triples from the sentence according to the relations in the ontology. In the output, only include the triples in the given output format. The resulting graph should only contain concept nodes from the ontology and strictly follow relations between concepts. 

CONTEXT:

Ontology Concepts: Organization, Asset, Energy, Emission, Measurement, Unit, InternalEnergyGenerationProcess, InternalManufactProcess, ExternalEnergyGenerationProcess 
Ontology Relations: Organization~owns~Asset|Asset~consumes~Energy|Energy~generatedFrom~InternalEnergyGenerationProcess|Energy~usedIn~InternalManufactProcess|Energy~generatedFrom~ExternalEnergyGenerationProcess|InternalEnergyGenerationProcess~emitsS1~Emission|InternalManufactProcess~emitsS1~Emission|ExternalEnergyGenerationProcess~emitsS2~Emission|Energy~hasMeasurements~Measurement |Emission~hasMeasurements~Measurement|Measurement~hasUnit~Unit|Measurement~hasValue~string
Example Sentence:During the 2022 fiscal year Siemensâ€™ transportation system amounted to 1.118 metric tons of CO2. Resulting to 5.6 million gigajoules energy consumption.We calculate our emissions from electricity consumption on the basis of the CO2 emission factors of local sites according to the market-based approach.
Example Output:
Siemens~owns~Transportation system|Transportation system~consumes~Energy|Energy~hasMeasurement~Energy consumption|Energy consumption~hasValue~5.6 million|Energy consumption~hasUnit~gigajoules|Energy~generatedFrom~InternalEnergyGenerationProcess| Energy~usedIn~InternalManufactProcess|InternalEnergyGenerationProcess~emits~Emission|Emission~hasMeasurement~Electricity consumption*CO2factor/1000|Electricity consumption*CO2factor/1000~hasValue~1.118|Electricity consumption*CO2factor/1000~hasUnit~metric tons of CO2| 

Test Sentence:{text}
Test Output:
